title:
At the North end of Bolivia, before turning onto 17, there use to be a convenience store, grill, house ... now everything is demolished.  Are there any plans for this area? 



thank you,

--debi
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2016/05/are-there-any-plans-for-the-site-of-the-former-convenience-store-before-us-17-at-the-north-end-of-bolivia/
